channel.title: Gregory White on Transcripts of Iriss.fm
channel.description: Recent content in Gregory White on Transcripts of Iriss.fm

item.title: Welfare reform. Impact on third sector social and housing care providers in Scotland
item.description: GW - Gregory White SD - Shaheena Din KM - Kirsty McKechnie Iriss and CCPS - the Coalition of Care and Support Providers in Scotland, collaborated on an ESRC funded research project to investigate the impact of welfare reform on third sector social and housing care providers in Scotland. The results of this project were shared at a workshop on the 23rd of April 2014. First, Lead Researcher Gregory White, describes the project and its findings.
